descriptions.mainCopy:
I am a jet-black soul from the darkness!
An abomination of the human world, and the mortals!
Ah, stupid! Just so stupid!
descriptions.subDescription:
Her goal is to become a great demon and conquer the human world.
She is 3, but time flows in the demon world is different from the humans', 
and she has a lot of knowledge for a three-year-old.
